messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

mail delivery failure original message sent tuesday failure agent was unable deliver your message following addresses reason exceeded without message subject was card access message date was message identifier was message reference was server tower please sent unattended mailbox contact your administrator if you need more information or instructions for resolving issue
